title: Wish Upon a Star
overview: A Korean Cinderella Story kind of...Wish Upon a Star has it all High fashion, music, love, hate, dreams and let downs. Yun Hee has lived in an orphanage since her father passed away. Later she's adopted into a hostile family environment by one of her father's friends. With the evil stepmother Ms. Song and evil stepsister treating her like low class theif she decides to take her fate into her own hands. Yun Hee has two heroes to help her along the way: Kang Min Hee, a young man who dreams of becoming a successful singer despite his father's objections, and Lee Joon Hee, a top fashion design executive.
